article_title: Defaced Israel-Gaza peace mural painted over by TfL
sentence: Sprayed  onto  the  mural  were  the  words:  'Palestinian  children  killed  since  07.09.23  11,500'  and  'Funded  by  your  taxes.

article_title: Defaced Israel-Gaza peace mural painted over by TfL
sentence: Israel  says  more  than  1,200  civilians  were  killed  in  the  attack  and  more  than  250  people  taken  hostage  -  of  whom  130  are  estimated  to  still  be  held  by  Hamas.

article_title: Defaced Israel-Gaza peace mural painted over by TfL
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  has  estimated  more  than  30,000  people  have  been  killed  in  the  strikes.
